content:
Somewhat disoriented from your journey underground, you’re unsure of where in the Valley this massive sinkhole is located, but it must be well guarded by the surrounding wilderness and inaccessible to any but the most intrepid and reclusive of explorers. Wherever you are, you welcome the sight of clouds overhead and breathe deeply, the fresh air a tonic to your lungs. As you marvel at the exposed earthen walls, shot through with intricate root systems entangled with Estian ruins, you discover a series of climber’s pitons wedged into a narrow fissure, describing a path up to the surface. Judging by the cleanliness of the pitons and the marks on the wall, you determine that someone must have climbed down here fairly recently.

Search the General set for Lunn, Curious Scavenger and shuffle him into the path deck.
